Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent local Handle = Tool:WaitForChild('Handle')
local Horns = Instance.new('Part') Horns.Size = Vector3.new(4.15, 1.88, 2.1) Horns.Name = 'Horns' Horns.CanCollide = false local HornsMesh = Instance.new('SpecialMesh') HornsMesh.TextureId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=126694422' HornsMesh.MeshId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=126694637' HornsMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.8,0.8,0.8) HornsMesh.Parent = Horns local Fire = Instance.new('Fire') Fire.Color = Color3.new(0,0,0) Fire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(1,0,0) Fire.Heat = 10 Fire.Size = 10 Fire.Parent = Horns
local TorsoGyro = Instance.new('BodyGyro') TorsoGyro.Name = 'HornPotionTorsoGyro' TorsoGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(1E10,1E10,1E10)
local YLocker = Instance.new('BodyPosition') YLocker.Name = 'HornPotionYLocker' YLocker.maxForce = Vector3.new(0, 1E8, 0)
local Mover = Instance.new('BodyForce') Mover.Name = 'HornPotionMover' Mover.force = Vector3.new(0,0,0)
local Torso local Head local Humanoid local HornsClone local YLockerClone local TorsoGyroClone local MoverClone local Angle = 0
local UP = 17 local DOWN = 18 local RIGHT = 19 local LEFT = 20
local FORCE_MAGNITUDE = 3E3 local DRAG_COEFFICIENT = 50 local DELTA_ANGLE = math.pi/20
local KeyIsPressed = {}
local TIME_BETWEEN_USES = 32 local BEFORE_SOUND_TIME = 0.5 local AFTER_SOUND_TIME = 1.5 local NUM_TRANSPARENCY_STEPS = 10 local NUM_BEND_STEPS = 10
local Anims = {}
local DrinkSound local LaughSound
local Debris = game:GetService('Debris')
local Mouse
local HORN_WELD_C1 = CFrame.new(0, -0.9446, -0.6, -1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, -1)
local function Play(animationName) if not Anims[animationName] then local humanoid = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if humanoid and humanoid:IsA('Humanoid') then local unloadedAnim = Tool:FindFirstChild(animationName) if unloadedAnim then Anims[animationName] = humanoid:LoadAnimation(unloadedAnim) end end end if Anims[animationName] then Anims[animationName]:Play() end end
local function Stop(animationName) if Anims[animationName] then Anims[animationName]:Stop() end end
local function weldHornsTo(character) local hornsClone = Horns:Clone() hornsClone.Transparency = 1.0 hornsClone.Parent = character local weld = Instance.new('ManualWeld') weld.Part0 = character.Head weld.Part1 = hornsClone weld.C0 = CFrame.new() weld.C1 = HORN_WELD_C1 weld.Parent = character
return hornsClone end
local function resetGlobalVariables() Angle = 0 MoverClone = nil YLockerClone = nil TorsoGyroClone = nil end
function OnKeyDown(key) KeyIsPressed[string.byte(key)] = true end
function OnKeyUp(key) KeyIsPressed[string.byte(key)] = false end
function OnTouched(part) local character = part.Parent if character and character ~= Tool.Parent and not character:FindFirstChild('HornPotionDebounceTag') then local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if humanoid then local debounce = Instance.new('BoolValue') debounce.Name = 'HornPotionDebounceTag' debounce.Parent = character Debris:AddItem(debounce, 1) local tag = Instance.new('ObjectValue') tag.Value = game.Players.LocalPlayer tag.Name = 'creator' tag.Parent = humanoid Debris:AddItem(tag, 2)
if HornsClone then humanoid:TakeDamage(HornsClone.Velocity.magnitude) else humanoid:TakeDamage(20) end end end end
function Run() while HornsClone and YLockerClone and TorsoGyroClone and MoverClone and Torso and Head do local speed = Torso.Velocity.magnitude if Anims['RunAnim'] then Anims['RunAnim']:AdjustSpeed(speed / 10) end local fire = HornsClone:FindFirstChild('Fire') if fire then fire.Heat = speed / 5 fire.Size = speed / 4 end
local camera = Workspace.CurrentCamera local cameraLook = camera.Focus.p - camera.CoordinateFrame.p cameraLook = Vector3.new(cameraLook.x, 0, cameraLook.z).unit local leftVector = Vector3.new(0,1,0):Cross(cameraLook)
local part, point = Workspace:FindPartOnRay(Ray.new(Head.Position, Vector3.new(0,-999,-0)), Torso.Parent) if part then --print(part.Name) YLockerClone.position = Vector3.new(0, math.max(point.y + 2, Torso.Position.y - 10), 0) else YLockerClone.position = Vector3.new(0, Torso.Position.y - 10, 0) end
local isFirstPerson = false if (camera.CoordinateFrame.p - Head.Position).magnitude < 0.5 then print(tostring(cameraLook)) isFirstPerson = true end
local force = Vector3.new(0,0,0) local gyroCFrame = TorsoGyroClone.cframe if KeyIsPressed[UP] or KeyIsPressed[string.byte('w')] or KeyIsPressed[string.byte('W')] then force = force + FORCE_MAGNITUDE * cameraLook gyroCFrame = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(), cameraLook) * CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2,0,0) end if KeyIsPressed[DOWN] or KeyIsPressed[string.byte('s')] or KeyIsPressed[string.byte('S')] then force = force - FORCE_MAGNITUDE * cameraLook gyroCFrame = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(), -cameraLook) * CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2,0,0) end if KeyIsPressed[LEFT] or KeyIsPressed[string.byte('a')] or KeyIsPressed[string.byte('A')] then force = force + FORCE_MAGNITUDE * leftVector Angle = math.min(Angle + DELTA_ANGLE, math.pi/2) gyroCFrame = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(), cameraLook) * CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2, 0, Angle) end if KeyIsPressed[RIGHT] or KeyIsPressed[string.byte('d')] or KeyIsPressed[string.byte('D')] then force = force - FORCE_MAGNITUDE * leftVector Angle = math.max(Angle - DELTA_ANGLE, -math.pi/2) gyroCFrame = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(), cameraLook) * CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2, 0, Angle) end
local drag = -DRAG_COEFFICIENT * Torso.Velocity
MoverClone.force = force + drag if isFirstPerson then TorsoGyroClone.cframe = CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2, 0, 0) else TorsoGyroClone.cframe = gyroCFrame end wait() end end
function OnActivated() if Tool.Enabled then resetGlobalVariables() Tool.Enabled = false local character = Tool.Parent if character then Play('EatAnim') wait(BEFORE_SOUND_TIME) if character == Tool.Parent then DrinkSound = Tool:FindFirstChild('DrinkSound') if DrinkSound then DrinkSound:Play() end Torso = character:FindFirstChild('Torso') Head = character:FindFirstChild('Head') Humanoid = character:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if Torso and Head and Humanoid then HornsClone = weldHornsTo(character) HornsClone.Touched:connect(OnTouched) for i = 1, NUM_TRANSPARENCY_STEPS do Handle.Transparency = i / NUM_TRANSPARENCY_STEPS HornsClone.Transparency = 1 - i / NUM_TRANSPARENCY_STEPS wait(AFTER_SOUND_TIME / NUM_TRANSPARENCY_STEPS) end if DrinkSound then DrinkSound:Stop() end --prevent it from reaching the "ahhh" part... didn't want to upload a new sound --addFloatForce(character).Parent = Torso if character == Tool.Parent then YLockerClone = YLocker:Clone() YLockerClone.position = Torso.Position - Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) YLockerClone.Parent = Torso Humanoid.PlatformStand = true TorsoGyroClone = TorsoGyro:Clone() TorsoGyroClone.cframe = Torso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2,0,0) TorsoGyroClone.Parent = Torso MoverClone = Mover:Clone() MoverClone.Parent = Torso LaughSound = Tool:FindFirstChild('LaughSound') if LaughSound then LaughSound:Play() end if Mouse then Mouse.KeyDown:connect(OnKeyDown) Mouse.KeyUp:connect(OnKeyUp) end Play('RunAnim') if Anims['RunAnim'] then Anims['RunAnim']:AdjustSpeed(0) end -- Don't start running till you get mouse presses Spawn(Run) end end if DrinkSound then DrinkSound:Stop() end end end end end
function OnEquipped(mouse) Stop('EatAnim') Stop('RunAnim') Handle.Transparency = 0.0 if mouse then Mouse = mouse end Tool.Enabled = true end
function OnUnequipped() if Torso then local gyro = Torso:FindFirstChild('HornPotionTorsoGyro') if gyro then gyro:Destroy() end local bodyPos = Torso:FindFirstChild('HornPotionYLocker') if bodyPos then bodyPos:Destroy() end local mover = Torso:FindFirstChild('HornPotionMover') if mover then mover:Destroy() end end if HornsClone then HornsClone:Destroy() end if Humanoid then Humanoid.PlatformStand = false end Stop('EatAnim') Stop('RunAnim') if LaughSound then LaughSound:Stop() end if DrinkSound then DrinkSound:Stop() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Activated:connect(OnActivated) Tool.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequipped)
